torchlight.title: Torchlight: Infinite

intro.title: Introduction to Torchlight Infinite
intro.description: Developer/Publisher: XD Inc. Torchlight Infinite is the latest entry in the popular action RPG (ARPG) series 'Torchlight', released on May 9, 2023. It continues the story of 'Torchlight 2', where players team up with heroes to reclaim the light of the continent of Leptis against darkness.

torchlight.details: This page provides various guides and information on Torchlight Infinite, as well as an MP Seal Calculator.

mp_calculator.title: MP Seal Calculator
mp_calculator.description: Calculate the MP seal system and find the optimal skill combination.

cooltime_calculator.title: Cooldown Calculator
cooltime_calculator.description: Calculate the cooldown system to build your optimal setup.

rune_price.title: Diablo 4 Rune Price Search
rune_price.description: Search and compare rune prices in Diablo 4 in real-time. Search by rune name to check current trading prices.

calculator.title: Torchlight Infinite MP Seal Calculator
calculator.intro: Calculate Torchlight Infinite’s MP seal system to find the optimal skill setup. Enter each skill’s seal rate and auxiliary skill MP multiplier to calculate total MP seal and remaining MP.

settings.title: Global Settings
settings.pathfinder: Use Pathfinder (Auxiliary skill multiplier fixed at 0.95)

guide.title: Calculation Method Guide
guide.formula: Final Seal Rate = (Base Seal × Auxiliary MP Multiplier) ÷ (1 + Total MP Seal Bonus) ÷ (1 - Additional Seal Penalty)
guide.step1: Base Seal: Base seal × Cumulative Auxiliary MP Multiplier
guide.step2: Apply Bonus: Base seal ÷ (1 + Total Seal Bonus)
guide.step3: Apply Penalty: Adjusted seal ÷ (1 - Additional Bonus Rate)
guide.term1: Base Seal: The base seal rate of the skill (e.g., 20%)
guide.term2: Cumulative Auxiliary MP Multiplier: With Pathfinder, multiply 0.95 per auxiliary skill
guide.term3: Total MP Seal Bonus: Global + individual bonus rates (used in denominator)
guide.term4: Additional Seal Penalty: HP seal modifier (negative increases seal, positive decreases it)
guide.term5: A -65% penalty is calculated as (1 - 0.65) = 0.35 (resulting in a higher seal rate)

calculator.warning: ⚠️ Note: Due to floating-point calculations, values may slightly differ from in-game numbers, which may be due to display logic discrepancies in the game.

footer.disclaimer: This site is not affiliated with game companies. All game assets are property of their respective owners.
